markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hellfire Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=735)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These heavy boots are made of blackened metal and always feel warm to the touch, with streams of glowing embers cascading off their heels. While wearing _hellfire boots_, you gain resistance 10 to fire damage.

<document level="2" id="action-581" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Hellfire Boots
